$interpreted: Dylan: Men, today is your first day as members of the Kingdom of the Sun's Royal Infantry.
Dylan: As Colonel, I welcome each and every one of you, and have high expectations.
Jahan: What's with the pause, you blockheads? Colonel Levon has spoken. Where's your salute?
Dylan: Not necessary. As a member of the Royal Infantry myself, my fellow soldiers are like family to me.
Dylan: No need for such formality.
Jahan: B-B-B-Bad idea, Colonel Levon!
Jahan: You must first establish hierarchy within the army so these brats won't try anything funny...
Theodore: Jahan is correct.
Sione: (Beasts from Paradise Prairie? What are they doing here in the Capitol?)
Jahan: His Majesty, as charming as ever I see!
Theodore: Out of my way!
Theodore: All of you pay close attention! This is my throne!
Theodore: For those who dare covet this throne, no matter who, the Royal Infantry shall show them no mercy!
Todd: As His Majesty just said, the Royal Infantry shoulders great responsibility.
Todd: Each one of you will execute these beasts with your own hands to show His Majesty your determination to join the Royal Infantry.
Dylan: Wait, your Majesty, there is no need to...!
Theodore: This is a direct order. Todd, do it!
Todd: One at a time! First on the list of new recruits, you. Begin!
Todd: Next!
Todd: Next... Sione Aldric!
Jahan: Aldric!?
Rookie Soldier: ...Isn't that one of the Twelve Nobles?
New Soldier: You're kidding right, a lady from one of the Twelve Nobles enlisted in the army?
Sione: I am Sione Aldric.
Todd: *cough*...then, begin!
Theodore: What are you doing? Kill them!
Sione: I...
Sione: Apologies, Your Majesty. I can't do it.
Theodore: You dare disobey me!?
Theodore: As you are a member of the Aldric family... I will not punish you for disobeying my orders this time.  But no second chances!
Theodore: Todd, let's go.

Model.Text: Men, today is your first day as members of the Kingdom of the Sun's Royal Infantry.
As Colonel, I welcome each and every one of you, and have high expectations.
What's with the pause, you blockheads? Colonel Levon has spoken. Where's your salute?
Not necessary. As a member of the Royal Infantry myself, my fellow soldiers are like family to me.
No need for such formality.
B-B-B-Bad idea, Colonel Levon!
You must first establish hierarchy within the army so these brats won't try anything funny...
Jahan is correct.
(Beasts from Paradise Prairie? What are they doing here in the Capitol?)
His Majesty, as charming as ever I see!
Out of my way!
All of you pay close attention! This is my throne!
For those who dare covet this throne, no matter who, the Royal Infantry shall show them no mercy!
As His Majesty just said, the Royal Infantry shoulders great responsibility.
Each one of you will execute these beasts with your own hands to show His Majesty your determination to join the Royal Infantry.
Wait, your Majesty, there is no need to...!
This is a direct order. Todd, do it!
One at a time! First on the list of new recruits, you. Begin!
Next!
Next... Sione Aldric!
Aldric!?
...Isn't that one of the Twelve Nobles?
You're kidding right, a lady from one of the Twelve Nobles enlisted in the army?
I am Sione Aldric.
*cough*...then, begin!
What are you doing? Kill them!
Apologies, Your Majesty. I can't do it.
You dare disobey me!?
As you are a member of the Aldric family... I will not punish you for disobeying my orders this time.  But no second chances!
Todd, let's go.
